Back to Ludwig van Beethoven

Ludwig van Beethoven

Seven ländlerische Tänze, WoO 11

1796–1799 · Hess 27 (version for two violins and bass) · Biamonti 163

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 4'

  • 1. D major
  • 2. D major
  • 3. D major
  • 4. D major
  • 5. D major
  • 6. D major
  • 7. D major
  • Coda

These are piano versions of dances for probably orchestra or for two violins and bass. The other versions, if any ever existed, are lost.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · VII/8 [in preparation]
  • Henle · HN 449 · Tänze für Klavier · ed. Robert Forster
  • Könemann · K 197 · Tänze · ed. István Máriássy
